from.description: The (Ethereum-style) address of the account transfering the asset

nonce.description: The nonce (64 bit unsigned integer) of the account transfering the asset

asset_id.description: The id (hex-encoded 256 bit hash) of the asset (returned when asset was created)

to.description: The (Ethereum-style) address of the account receiving the asset

amount.description: The amount (of asset) to be transfered (u128 formatted as hex string)
